what are we doing well? prompts for thin: Taking careful steps without rushing, after discussions with the community.
what could we do better? prompts for thi:
- Focus more on modern/async saving mechanisms (TiddlyPWA but native)
- Easier direct capture of information, maybe through WYSIWYG instead of modal modes (ie edit mode OR viewing mode)
- Easily accessible library of ready-made solutions to common questions/problem
- Far future (after 5.4.x or even 6.x): a kind of Do What I Mean syntax to avoid all Those Pesky Bracketsâ„¢
